content: I figured this stream (sub-stream?) could be where we discuss possible projects. I know there were a couple that were already floating out there. One that I wanted to ask about (although I don't have much experience using it), has anyone looked into mapping HSDS to FHIR? And would there be any value to this?
Grey, I like this idea as it seems like somthing we could really accomplish in the first year and a valuable contribution. I look forward to hearing more!

Grey - I know you were going to reach out to Open Referral. Would it be helpful for @Sheetal Shah to send an intro email for you and Greg Bloom who is the founder of the Open Referral Initiative? Greg has said that he wants to get involved with the HSS WG already.
@Grey Faulkenberry just making sure you saw my earlier message re: Greg Bloom / Open Referral.
@Karen Bertodatti Yes, thanks! I emailed him and I'm going to try and setup a meeting with him (as well as invite him to our next group meetings)
